mapper.select: select r.replyNum, r.memberNum, r.productNum, r.replyDate, r.choice, r.replyContent, m.nickname from reply r, member m where choice=#{choice} and productNum=#{productNum} and r.memberNum=m.memberNum order by r.replyNum
mapper.update: update reply set replyContent=#{replyContent} where replyNum=#{replyNum}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(replyNum, memberNum, productNum, replyContent, replyDate, choice, parentNum, depth) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{memberNum}, #{productNum}, #{replyContent}, sysdate, #{choice}, #{parentNum}, #{depth})
